ComicInfo.Summary:
From the mind of Kurt Busiek, the all-new ongoing horror series continues! When a powerful, predatory corporation acquires the valuable asset that is Dracula, they are not prepared for what they have awakened. Despite being trapped by the corporation, Dracula will let no one stop him from rebuilding his kingdom. Even if it takes a hundred more years. And many more bodies. Itâ€™s bloodsuckers vs. bloodsucker, as Busiek brings an incredibly modern spin to the Dracula mythos.
